bibl.title: Family Finances in Byzantine Near East: P. Petra inv. 68.
bibl.note: Signed settlement between the two best-known men in the Petra archive (the future archdeacon Theodoros and his maternal uncle Patrophilos) dealing with a dowry. May 23, 537.

bibl.title: Atti del XXII Congresso Internazionale di Papirologia. Firenze, 23-29 agosto 1998. Volume I

bibl.seg: ARJAVA Antti, Family Finances in Byzantine Near East: P. Petra inv. 68.

Isabella ANDORLINI, Guido BASTIANINI, Manfredo MANFREDI e Giovanna MENCI (a cura di), Atti del XXII Congresso Internazionale di Papirologia. Firenze, 23-29 agosto 1998. Volume I (Firenze, 2001) pp. 65-70.
Signed settlement between the two best-known men in the Petra archive (the future archdeacon Theodoros and his maternal uncle Patrophilos) dealing with a dowry. May 23, 537.
